name: Mounted Skirmisher
description: You are adept at attacking from upon a swift moving steed.
prerequisites: Ride rank 14, Mounted Combat, Trick Riding
benefit: If your mount moves its speed or less, you can still take a full-attack action.
normal: If your mount moves more than 5 feet, you can only take an attack action.
staminaText: When your mount moves its speed or less, you can spend 5 stamina points to spur it on 10 additional feet. This is bonus movement, and you can still make a full attack when your mount takes this bonus movement.
